note.p: Birth: 27 Bouverie Street, London, England (07 October 1832)
Education: School of Mines, London; Freiburg

Career: Went to India with his brother, on staff of the Indian Geological Survey; went on the Abyssinian expedition (1867); studied geology in Persia, returning via Russia; Deputy Superintendent of the Geological Survey of India (by 1874); retired to London (1882)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1907 vol 79 pp xxvii-xxxi signed by T G B
